definition-item.definition-title: WORKING OR PROCESSING OF METAL WIRE ({reducing diameter by} rolling of metal B21B; by drawing, auxiliary operations used in connection with metal-working without essentially removing material B21C; bundling articles B65B13/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: Methods as well as devices relating to working or processing of metal wire, i.e. modifying, not manufacturing the wire:

Wire working methods characterized by the product made (e.g. barbed wire, wire network etc). These aspects are covered by B21F25/00-B21F45/28
Miscellaneous wire working and processing. These aspects are covered by B21F99/00
